trans-unit.source: Provides methods for setting and capturing the compressed stack on the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder metoder for angivelse og tar komprimert stakken på gjeldende tråd.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan arves.

trans-unit.source: The compressed stack is a compact representation of all the code access security information on the call stack, such as <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A> and <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A> actions.
trans-unit.target: Komprimert stakken er en kompakt representasjon av alle kode tilgang til sikkerhetsinformasjonen på kallstakken eksempel <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>og <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A>Handlinger.</xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A> </xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A> action is two stack frames up from the current frame and there are no other code access security annotations between there and the current frame, the compressed stack records only that information, without having to serialize the entire call stack.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis en <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>handling er to stable forhandleren opp fra gjeldende ramme og det finnes ingen kode tilgang sikkerhet merknader mellom der og den gjeldende rammen komprimert stakken registrerer bare denne informasjonen, uten å serialisere hele kallstakken.</xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>

trans-unit.source: The CompressedStackclass is used internally by the <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> class.
trans-unit.target: CompressedStackclass brukes internt <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext>klasse.</xref:System.Security.SecurityContext>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext.Capture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method captures the compressed stack for the current call stack, along with impersonation and culture information.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel den <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext.Capture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden fanger komprimert stakken for den gjeldende kall-bunken, sammen med representasjonsnivået og kultur.</xref:System.Security.SecurityContext.Capture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> class is used in turn by the <xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext> class to flow context across threads, for example when scheduling thread pool tasks.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext>klassen brukes i sin tur ved den <xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext>klassen til flyten konteksten på tvers av tråder, for eksempel når du planlegger tråd oppgaver for applikasjonsutvalg.</xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext> </xref:System.Security.SecurityContext>

trans-unit.source: This class is not used in ordinary application programming.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen brukes ikke i vanlige application programming.

trans-unit.source: Captures the compressed stack from the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Registrerer komprimert stakken fra gjeldende tråd.

trans-unit.source: Captures all the code access security information on the call stack, such as <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A> and <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A> actions, in a compressed format.
trans-unit.target: Registrerer alle kode tilgang til sikkerhetsinformasjonen på kallstakken eksempel <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>og <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A>Handlinger, i et komprimert format.</xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A> </xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A> action is two stack frames up from the current frame and there are no other code access security annotations between there and the current frame, the compressed stack records only that information, without having to serialize the entire call stack.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis en <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>handling er to stable forhandleren opp fra gjeldende ramme og det finnes ingen kode tilgang sikkerhet merknader mellom der og den gjeldende rammen komprimert stakken registrerer bare denne informasjonen, uten å serialisere hele kallstakken.</xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>

trans-unit.source: The captured compressed stack can be applied to another thread.
trans-unit.target: Opphentede komprimert stakken kan brukes i en annen tråd.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Threading.CompressedStack"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Threading.CompressedStack"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of the current compressed stack.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kopi av den gjeldende komprimert bunken.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful for creating a copy of the current compressed stack to apply to another thread.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er nyttig for å opprette en kopi av gjeldende komprimert stakkplass til å bruke en annen tråd.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Threading.CompressedStack"></xref> object representing the current compressed stack.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Threading.CompressedStack"> </xref> -objekt som representerer gjeldende komprimert bunke.

trans-unit.source: Gets the compressed stack for the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Henter den komprimerte bunken for gjeldende tråd.

trans-unit.source: If security is enabled, the current compressed stack is returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis sikkerhet er aktivert, returneres den gjeldende komprimert bunken.

trans-unit.source: If security is disabled, GetCompressedStack returns an empty <xref:System.Threading.CompressedStack> object.
trans-unit.target: Hvis sikkerhet er deaktivert, GetCompressedStack returnerer et tomt <xref:System.Threading.CompressedStack>objektet.</xref:System.Threading.CompressedStack>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method uses <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName> to prevent it from being called from untrusted code; only the immediate caller is required to have <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> permission.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden bruker <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName>vil hindre at den blir kalt fra uklarerte kode; bare umiddelbar Oppkalleren må ha <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>tillatelse.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For important limitations on using the `LinkDemand` member, see [Demand vs. LinkDemand](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/1ab877f2-70f4-4e0d-8116-943999dfe8f5).
trans-unit.target: For viktige begrensninger på ved hjelp av den `LinkDemand` medlem, kan du se [krever kontra. LinkDemand](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/1ab877f2-70f4-4e0d-8116-943999dfe8f5).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This member also makes a link demand for the ECMA public key, which is not a valid cryptographic key but a pseudo key.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Dette medlemmet er også en kobling behov for fellesnøkkelen ECMA, som ikke er en gyldig krypteringsnøkkel, men en pseudo-nøkkel.

trans-unit.source: Within the .NET Framework the link demand for the ECMA pseudo key is automatically converted to a link demand for the Microsoft public key.
trans-unit.target: I .NET Framework konverteres koblingen behov for nøkkelen ECMA pseudo til en kobling behov for fellesnøkkelen Microsoft automatisk.

trans-unit.source: The security exception is based on the Microsoft public key, not the ECMA pseudo key.
trans-unit.target: Sikkerhetsunntak er basert på Microsoft fellesnøkkelen, ikke ECMA pseudo-nøkkelen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Threading.CompressedStack"></xref> for the current thread.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Threading.CompressedStack"> </xref> for gjeldende tråd.

trans-unit.source: A caller in the call chain does not have permission to access unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: En oppringer i kallet kjeden har ikke tilgang til ubehandlet kode.

trans-unit.source: -or- The request for <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission"></xref> failed.
trans-unit.target: - eller - forespørselen om <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission"> </xref> mislyktes.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with the logical context information needed to recreate an instance of this execution context.
trans-unit.target: Angir den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objekt med logiske konteksten informasjonen som kreves for å opprette en forekomst av denne utføringskontekst.

trans-unit.source: GetObjectData sets a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> with the logical call context information.
trans-unit.target: GetObjectData angir en <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>med logisk kalle informasjon om sikkerhetskontekst.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: During deserialization, the execution context object is reconstituted from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> transmitted over the stream.
trans-unit.target: Under deserialisering, reconstituted kjøring context-objektet fra den <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>overføres via dataflyten.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object to be populated with serialization information.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objektet som er fylt med serialisering informasjon.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> structure representing the destination context of the serialization.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>-struktur representerer målet konteksten for serialisering.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: info is .
trans-unit.target: infois .

trans-unit.source: Runs a method in the specified compressed stack on the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Kjører en metode i den angitte komprimerte stakken på gjeldende tråd.

trans-unit.source: The compressed stack is returned to its previous state when the method completes.
trans-unit.target: Komprimert stakken returneres til sin opprinnelige tilstand når metoden er fullført.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Threading.CompressedStack"></xref> to set.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Threading.CompressedStack"></xref> to set.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Threading.ContextCallback> that represents the method to be run in the specified security context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Threading.ContextCallback>som representerer metoden kjøres i den angitte sikkerhetskonteksten.</xref:System.Threading.ContextCallback>

trans-unit.source: The object to be passed to the callback method.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som skal sendes til metoden tilbakeringing.

trans-unit.source: compressedStack is .
trans-unit.target: compressedStackis .
